Package networks

Class NeuronBasedNeuralNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • networks.NeuralNetwork
      • networks.NeuronBasedNeuralNetwork
  • public class NeuronBasedNeuralNetwork
extends NeuralNetwork
    Implementation of the abstract class NeuralNetwork using instances of the Neuron class and its subclasses.
    Author:
    OdinhengeT
    See Also:
    NeuralNetwork, Layer, Neuron

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      NeuronBasedNeuralNetwork​(int[] layers)
      Creates a NeuronBasedNeuralNetwork with nbrLayers Layers with nbrLinks and nbrNeurons as provided by argument.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Layer[] getLayers()
      Returns all the networks Layers in a Layer[].
      double[] run​(double[] input)
      The NeuralNetwork is given an input vector and by passing its values through the NeuralNetwork, calculates an output vector.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a String representation of the Network.
      void train​(double[][] input, double[][] target)
      Trains the network with multiple inputs (each being a vector) and their corresponding targets (also a vector each), by updating the weights of the Neurons in the NeuralNetwork using gradient descent.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • NeuronBasedNeuralNetwork

        public NeuronBasedNeuralNetwork​(int[] layers)
        Creates a NeuronBasedNeuralNetwork with nbrLayers Layers with nbrLinks and nbrNeurons as provided by argument. The first Layer is an InputLayer, the last Layer is an OutputLayer and the Layers inbetween are InnerLayers.
        Parameters:
        layers - an int[] with length equal to the number of Layers the Network should have, and values equal to the number of Neurons (excluding eventual BiasNeurons)

    • Method Detail

      • getLayers

        public Layer[] getLayers()
        Returns all the networks Layers in a Layer[].

      • run

        public double[] run​(double[] input)
        The NeuralNetwork is given an input vector and by passing its values through the NeuralNetwork, calculates an output vector.
        Specified by:
        run in class NeuralNetwork
        Parameters:
        input - a double[] of inputvalues (one for each InputNeuron)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if nbr inputs != nbr InputNeurons

      • train

        public void train​(double[][] input,
                  double[][] target)
        Trains the network with multiple inputs (each being a vector) and their corresponding targets (also a vector each), by updating the weights of the Neurons in the NeuralNetwork using gradient descent.
        Specified by:
        train in class NeuralNetwork
        Parameters:
        input - multiple input vectors put together in an array
        target - multiple target vectors corresponding to those in input
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if input and target are of different length

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String representation of the Network.
        Specified by:
        toString in class NeuralNetwork
